Class VendingMachineCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • VendingMachineCLI
  • public class VendingMachineCLI
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      VendingMachineCLI()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void operatorMenu()
      This is the operator menu which allows the operator to Add Products, Remove Items from the machine or Quit
      void operatorValidation()
      This method reads in input (the operator PINS) from the operators.txt file and then asks the Operator to enter their Pin.
      void run()
      This method initialises the vending machine and allows the user to select which Operation Mode they want to use
      void userMenu()
      The userMenu allows the user to choose an option from a menu.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException
        This method initialises the vending machine and allows the user to select which Operation Mode they want to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - e

      • userMenu

        public void userMenu()
              throws java.io.IOException
        The userMenu allows the user to choose an option from a menu. The user can Show Products, Insert Coin, Buy Product, Remove Coins or Quit. These options then call a method from the VendingMachine class
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - e

      • operatorMenu

        public void operatorMenu()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This is the operator menu which allows the operator to Add Products, Remove Items from the machine or Quit
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - e

      • operatorValidation

        public void operatorValidation()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads in input (the operator PINS) from the operators.txt file and then asks the Operator to enter their Pin. If it matches one of the existing pins, the Operator can proceed to the Operator Menu
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - e
